title: Stevie Van Zandt: "Unrequited Infatuations"
description: Michael speaks with E Street Band Member (and fellow SiriusXM host) Stevie Van Zandt, with his new book "Unrequited Infatuations: A Memoir." Original air date 14 October 2021. The book was published on 28 September 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Stevie Van Zandt, TC Scornvavacchi, Steven Van Zandt, Michael Smerconish, Little Steven)
